lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I think of the good life I have, the goods and services available to me, the family support, and the variety in my life.  If what I do as a lender contributes to someone else's happiness, then I get immense joy from that.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of people who help employer groups obtain group health insurance coverage.  We try to make it affordable.

lenders.name: Monty

lenders.occupational_info: When the government reduces or stops paying benefits to a person, that person can ask a judge to review the case to see if the government decision was right.  I am such a judge.

lenders.occupational_info: I help companies do what they do better

lenders.name: Ellen

lenders.name: david

I just discovered this website and think it is great.

struggling families to sustain themselves is a gift to 
me. I look forward to sponsoring many more of these wonderfully spirited business owners and will be rooting for them all the way .

In western countries we take too many things for granted. What is a small object to us - a pair of shoes, a bike, or a small amount of money - can drastically improve the quality of someone's life.
I especially support women, as they represent the starting engine of socio-economic changes: big changes start from small ones, maybe confined only to the household or local community. One woman can change many things, but many women can change everything!

lenders.occupational_info: Not only is teaching children rewarding, but you have the chance to engage in life long learning too. Children often remind me of what is good in the world. Their unbias outlook in life, their dreams of endless possibilities and their naturally tendency to help others make  my worse days seem amazing. As political as a school can be, the effort it takes to teach children or the upset parents you deal with - all I need to do is escape into a classroom where magic happens for these children.

"If you give a man a fish he is hungry again in an hour; if you teach him to catch a fish you do him a good turn."[Anne Ritchie]
When a person is starving, that's not the time to fill their head with knowledge. The right thing to do is to first give the person a fish - banishing their hunger - and only then teach them to fish.

lenders.name: georgette
lenders.loan_because: I feel truly blessed to have everything in my life; my family, my health, food, security, and a home- I wish everyone one could share the simple joys of having such luxuries, (yes, these are luxuries!) Its seems everything we have here in the West we so often take for granted...its easy to forget how blessed you are compared to another person half way across the world- yet this site reminds me that when it comes to giving, every little bit helps to make someone else's hardships easier- I pray for the  successes of these enterpreneurs in their ventures, and I applaude their efforts to make themselves and their communities better. It makes me happy to see their stories of success, and allows me to see the best in humanity- I so rarely see it anymore, so this site gives me hope...
lenders.occupational_info: Typical office work- I sit all day long in front of a computer and then I go home to work all night on my laptop in my free time studying online school work!! lenders.name: Olive

lenders.name: Kerry

lenders.name: David, Sunita, and Anju
lenders.loan_because: i believe people are worth investing in

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone has moments in life where you are determined to do something and just need a little bit of help. This platform lets you help people with some financing at the right time. I love the entrepreneurial spirit and its power. It is what can change the world. Giving some aid in an immediate emergency is great, but for the long run, rather support people directly and empower them: 

Listen to this great TED talk: http://is.gd/3vF8J6
lenders.occupational_info:
I love to travel (40+ countries so far) and spend time with friends and family. I am also into sports and nutrition and all things Internet and tech. 

"The barbarian thinks that his is the only culture." - Anonymous

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: To payback help I have received in my life.

lenders.name: Lee and Danielle
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Experiencing a stimulating learning environment daily (student).

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: Having lived in a third world country, I felt frustrated and discouraged witnessing the lack of job opportunities for people who sincerely wanted to work. I believe in the American dream and through loaning I hope to extend this ideal globally.
lenders.occupational_info: I do outside work and maintenance for a small business, performing tasks such as mowing, weeding, small repairs and general upkeep of the office.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Its fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I design semiconductor laser diodes (similar to those found in cd players and optical mice) for use in medical, industrial, and defense systems.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have an obligation to help lift others up, especially when we are--by chance and luck--born into one of the wealthiest nations in the world.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I understand how privileged I am in this world. I understand that my success, and the success of my community, has come at the expense of others laboring in third world economies with political and economic institutions continuously suppressed by our overseeing hand. Direct micro financing through Kiva feels rewarding because I can try to help those who have, knowingly or unknowingly, helped me live my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with plants on a microscopic level to try and figure out how they grow. I look at their genes and their proteins. I then use that knowledge to help them grow in a better, more sustainable way.

lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful program and it's the right thing to do.
